vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὁσι-ότης, ητος, ἡ,
disposition to observe divine law, piety, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; πρὸς θεῶν ὁ. piety towards them, [Refs 1st c.AD+]; also, like Latin pietas, ἡ πρὸς γονεῖς ὁ. [Refs 1st c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef: piety, sacred observance of all duties towards God, holiness, Lk. 1:75; Eph. 4:24*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 對神的虔誠, 忠誠的持守對上帝的虔誠, 聖潔的責任 (路 1:75; 弗 4:24)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 对神的虔诚, 忠诚的持守对上帝的虔诚, 圣洁的责任 (路 1:75; 弗 4:24)
